00027     GOALPomdp::GOALPomdp(Controller* controller, Simulator* simulator, double discount, double stepSize) : OLPomdp(controller, simulator, discount, stepSize) {
00028         episodeSteps = 0;
00029         totalEpisodes=0;

00042     double GOALPomdp::doSteps(Vector& totalRewards, int steps, bool learn) {
00043 
00044         Vector action(simulator->getActionDim());
00045         Vector rewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00046         Vector reinforcement(simulator->getRewardDim());
00047         bool goalReached = false;
00048 
00049         totalRewards.clear();    
00050         episodes=0;
00051         successes=0;
00052 
00053         for (int s = 0; s < steps; s++) {
00054 
00055             simulator->getObservation(obs);
00056             if (learn && obs.getSteps()>0 && !goalReached) {
00057                 // Must do next line before calling getAction() since
00058                 // getAction will accumulate log action gradients into the
00059                 // trace directly for efficiency.
00060                 controller->discountTrace();
00061             }
00062             goalReached = false;
00063             controller->getAction(obs, action, learn);
00064             episodeSteps++;
00065             obs.setSteps(obs.getSteps()+1);
00066             goalReached = (bool)simulator->doAction(action);
00067             simulator->getReward(rewards);
00068             totalRewards += rewards;
00069             if (learn) {
00070                 reinforcement.assign(rewards-baseline);
00071                 // [daa] Check for 0 rewards is done at Controller level
00072                 controller->instantStep(reinforcement);
00073             }
00074             if (goalReached) {      
00075                 controller->resetTrace();
00076                 episodeSteps = 0;
00077                 episodes++;
00078                 // A positive reward counts as a successful run
00079                 if (norm_1(rewards) > 0) successes++; 
00080                 rewards.clear();
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         totalEpisodes += episodes;
00085         totalRewards/=steps;
00086         return inner_prod(totalRewards, scalar_vector<double>(simulator->getRewardDim(), 1.0))/simulator->getRewardDim();
00087     }

00098     double GOALPomdp::doSingleEpisode(Vector& totalRewards, bool learn) {
00099 
00100         Vector action(simulator->getActionDim());
00101         Vector rewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00102         Vector reinforcement(simulator->getRewardDim());
00103         bool goalReached = false;
00104 
00105         episodeSteps=0;
00106         successes=0;
00107         episodes=0;
00108 
00109         totalRewards.clear();    
00110 
00111         do {
00112 
00113             simulator->getObservation(obs);
00114             if (learn) {
00115                 // Must do next line before calling getAction() since
00116                 // getAction will accumulate log action gradients into the
00117                 // trace directly for efficiency.
00118                 controller->discountTrace();
00119             }
00120             controller->getAction(obs, action, learn);
00121             episodeSteps++;
00122             obs.setSteps(obs.getSteps()+1);
00123             goalReached = (bool)simulator->doAction(action);
00124             simulator->getReward(rewards);
00125             totalRewards += rewards;
00126             if (learn) {
00127                 reinforcement.assign(rewards-baseline);
00128                 // [daa] Check for 0 rewards is done at Controller level
00129                 controller->instantStep(reinforcement);
00130             }
00131         } while (!goalReached);
00132 
00133         controller->resetTrace();
00134 
00135         totalRewards/=episodeSteps;
00136 
00137         episodes++;
00138         if (norm_1(rewards) > 0) successes++; // A positive reward counts as a successful run
00139 
00140         // Return a scalar performance measure from vector rewards.
00141         return inner_prod(totalRewards, scalar_vector<double>(simulator->getRewardDim(), 1.0))/simulator->getRewardDim();
00142     }

00154     void GOALPomdp::printPerformanceInfo(bool printTitles, 
00155                                          int steps, 
00156                                          double avgReward, 
00157                                          double maxParam, 
00158                                          int seconds) {
00159         cout<<setprecision(PRECISION);
00160         if(printTitles) {
00161             cout<<"       "
00162                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"Steps"
00163                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"R"
00164                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"max(Param)"
00165                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"Seconds"
00166                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"Episodes"
00167                 <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"Succ%"<<endl;
00168         }
00169         cout<<"Trial: "
00170             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<steps
00171             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<avgReward
00172             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<maxParam
00173             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<seconds
00174             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<totalEpisodes
00175             <<setw(CWIDTH)<<successes/(double)episodes<< endl;
00176     }
